Text:
Thanks very much for this little-known gem in the U.S.A. - Agnetha deserved a much larger audience here after the break-up of ABBA.

Unfortunately, after a few albums (and different producers - Mike Chapman to Giorgio Moroder), it seemed like she didn't find her niche, but this and her other solo albums remain a testament to her excellence.

Thanks again for this labor of love (including the quality!) - it is very much appreciated!

P.S.

Thanks for all of her other terrific releases as well!
@ Coltbear50: Thanks, your comment is appreciated.
